name: Median income - S$50,000
description: Typical middle-income earner in Singapore (YA 2026). No personal income tax rebate for YA 2026.

sources.description: Calculated: S$0 (first $20k) + S$200 (2% on $10k) + S$350 (3.5% on $10k) + S$700 (7% on $10k) = S$1,250. Brackets unchanged from YA 2024 onwards. No rebate for YA 2026.
